name: Butsbal
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 1GHz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Nice game. Simple, fun and great to play with friends online if you have a group of four. Hard to find regular online matches though. Plenty of game modes to keep the fun going. Hopefully the game gets a loyal fanbase\playerbase over time and overall online activity picks up.
This game is SO good. Especially the new update. Its just so addicting. I played with a friend of mine for an hour straight. I reccomend it. Its worth the $3.29.
-rep worst game ever, got introduced to this game by a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ named Darkness3827 and had mental issues ever since. WARNING: DO NOT BUY! WILL GIVE YOU HEADACHES AND EPLIPSY!!
